page.title: 02CARSE GRAY ESTATE : FARMS
page.content: CARSE GRAY IS A 2500 ACRE ESTATE SITUATED 3 KM NORTH OF FORFAR OFF THE A94.IT IS OWNED BY LT.-COLONEL L.G.GRAY-CHEAPE. THE ESTATE CONSISTS OF MAINLY FARMLAND AND NINE OF THE SURROUNDING FARMS ARE ON THE ESTATE.THESE FARMS ARE LET TO PEOPLE TO CULTIVATE. THE FARMS ARE:{WARDMILL, QUILKOE, HOWMUIR, {HEATHERSTACKS, HATTON, CARSEGOWNIE, {CARSEBURN, CARSEBANK AND BAGGERTON.} { }ABOUT 120 ACRES OF THE ESTATE (4.8%) IS COVERED IN WOODLAND,90 ACRES (3.6%) IS COVERED IN ROUGHGROUND AND FARMLAND OCCUPIES 2290 ACRES. MOST OF THE FARMS ARE MIXED-ARABLE GROWING WHEAT,BARLEY,TURNIPS,POTATOES AND POSSIBLY OIL SEED RAPE.
